dot-fill.description: Whether or not to fill with dots

mode.description: For mode selection, see "Basic Usage" above
mode.description_zh: 模式选择，见上方"基本使用"说明

breathe.description: Whether the breathing effect is turned on or not, see the instructions above
breathe.description_zh: 是否开启呼吸效果，见上方说明

focus.description: Whether or not to get focus automatically

bold.description: Whether the font and input dash are bold
bold.description_zh: 字体和输入横线是否加粗

active-color.description: The style of the currently active input box
active-color.description_zh: 当前激活输入框的样式

inactive-color.description: The style of the inactive input box, the text color is the same as this value
inactive-color.description_zh: 非激活输入框的样式，文字颜色同此值

width.description: The width of the input box (higher than the width) in rpx
width.description_zh: 输入框的宽度(高等于宽)，单位rpx

disabled-keyboard.description: It is forbidden to click on the input box to evoke the system keyboard
disabled-keyboard.description_zh: 禁止点击输入框唤起系统键盘

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when the input content changes, as described above
events.description_zh: 输入内容发生改变时触发，具体见上方说明

events.name: finish
events.description: Triggered when the number of input characters reaches the maxlength value, see the description above
events.description_zh: 输入字符个数达maxlength值时触发，见上方说明
